title: Glottography dataset derived from Bouckaert et al. 2012 "Mapping the origins and expansion of the Indo-European language family"
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

Bouckaert, Remco, Philippe Lemey, Michael Dunn, Simon J Greenhill, Alexander V Alekseyenko, Alexei J Drummond, Russell D Gray & Quentin D Suchard Marc A and Atkinson. 2012. Mapping the origins and expansion of the Indo-European language family. Science 337(6097). 957–960. American Association for the Advancement of Science.
